Example:  
        from random_plus import random_plus
        a = random_plus().random_plus(EN='t', En='t', Many=100)  
        print(a)  
        option:  
            EN = Capital English  
            En =  Lower case English  
            Num = number 
            Mark = Punctuation  
            Many = Returns string length  
        
        default return string length is 8
